name: A Space Shooter Game
description:
This is a simple Space Shooter Game made in Godot Engine for studies proposes.

The controls for the game are:
W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys - To Moviment
Space Bar or Left Click - To Shoot

The source code can be found on Github

The assets i use are:

  • Superpowers Asset Packs for the Ships, Meteors, Lasers, Background, HUD and Sounds.
  • Explosion Animations Pack for the explosion effect.
  • m5x7 Font for the text.
